description: Tatsuki`s little brother, who appeared later in the season. He`s a street-smart, outgoing, but good-hearted boy who like his brother, thinks of himself as a ladies man. He used to have a crush on Ran, then Miyu, and then to Sayo, until he found out that Sayo and Masato had been dating ever since the beginning of junior high.
name: Kuroi Naoki
